text: In this video, we will show you two ways
to end your Amazon Prime membership.

For the first method,
go to Amazon's website
and log in to your account.
Then, go to "Account & Lists"
in the upper right corner of the screen.
Click "Memberships & Subscriptions."
On the next page,

you will see all of your
active Amazon subscriptions.
Click "Prime Membership Settings"
to the right of the Prime membership.
Select "Manage Membership,"
then select "End membership."
Another way to cancel your membership
is to select "Account & Lists."

Instead of selecting
"Memberships & Subscriptions,"
choose "Prime Membership."

In the next page, select
"Manage Membership,"
then select "End membership."

On the next page, select
"Cancel My Benefits."

On the next page, Amazon
will ask you to reconsider.

Select "Continue to Cancel"
to end your membership.
